Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayersFilter  
    ShootFunc  
    SquaresFilter  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmmoCard
    This class includes all the info relative to specific ammo cards present in the game.
    CardsFactory
    This cards generates the default set of cards that the game is played with.
    CounterAttackPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    Effects
    This class features a width number of public static methods that apply effects to the board state and the players.
    EndStartPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    InTurnPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    PowerUpCard
    This class contains all the generic methods and information common between all different types of power up cards.
    TargetsFilters
    This class features a width number of public static methods that filter which Players or Squares can be targeted.
    WeaponCard
    This class contains all the info relative to a weapon card and all the methods that concern the fire modes the weapon has.
